item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.
this week's location is: Cafe Nine

believe it or not, in more than 100 happy hours we've never done one here. though i do remember a post-hh party there a long while back. anyway, for those of you who have never been to Cafe Nine before, you should definitely come check it out. the place is well known for hosting a really eclectic mix of musical acts, including a lot of local artists, and feature live music every night.

drink specials are (until 9pm):

- $3 red stripe
- $3.50 imported drafts
- $3 domestic drafts
- $2.50 domestic bottles

your contact for the evening is Ben: 203-554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...
Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Mon. 10/29 - Happy Hour at Cafe Nine
